SqlConnectionEncryptionOption.summary: These options are used to control encryption behavior of the communication between the server and the client.

False.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is optional when connecting to the server. If the server requires encryption, encryption will be negotiated.

No.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is optional when connecting to the server. If the server requires encryption, encryption will be negotiated.

Optional.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is optional when connecting to the server. If the server requires encryption, encryption will be negotiated.

True.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is required when connecting to the server. If the server doesn't support encryption, the connection will fail.

Mandatory.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is required when connecting to the server. If the server doesn't support encryption, the connection will fail.

Strict.summary: Enables and requires TDS 8.0, TLS encryption to the server. If the server doesn't support TDS 8.0, TLS encryption, the connection will fail.
